message: Alice, since the money loses 5% value for you each round, waiting is costly for you. This offer gives you $4000 now, which is worth more than $5000 in future rounds. This is a fair deal considering the time pressure.
Last chance for a reasonable split, don't wait for further devaluation

Alice, the money is now worth about 10% less to you compared to round 1, and will continue to devalue. This $3500 now is actually worth more to you than waiting for future rounds where the value drops further. This is my final reasonable offer considering the continuing devaluation.
